travels.title: 231 Coyle
travels.headertext:
Photos of the construction process can be found in the
_LEFT_BR_RIGHT_ Here is the timeline of major activties:
_LEFT_UL_RIGHT_ _LEFT_LI_RIGHT_ _LEFT_B_RIGHT_11/09:_LEFT_/B_RIGHT_ See the property on MLS. Go to check it out _LEFT_LI_RIGHT_ _LEFT_B_RIGHT_12/09:_LEFT_/B_RIGHT_ Due diligence to understand all the easement/buffer issues _LEFT_LI_RIGHT_ _LEFT_B_RIGHT_01/11/10:_LEFT_/B_RIGHT_ Close on the property. _LEFT_LI_RIGHT_ _LEFT_B_RIGHT_02/10:_LEFT_/B_RIGHT_ Barn demolition _LEFT_LI_RIGHT_ _LEFT_B_RIGHT_02/10:_LEFT_/B_RIGHT_ Begin new house/ADU and septic design _LEFT_LI_RIGHT_ _LEFT_B_RIGHT_04/10:_LEFT_/B_RIGHT_ Old house asbestos removal _LEFT_LI_RIGHT_ _LEFT_B_RIGHT_04/10:_LEFT_/B_RIGHT_ Complete septic design _LEFT_LI_RIGHT_ _LEFT_B_RIGHT_05/10:_LEFT_/B_RIGHT_ Old house demolition _LEFT_LI_RIGHT_ _LEFT_B_RIGHT_06/10:_LEFT_/B_RIGHT_ Complete house design. Try to file permits. Find out we need to dig the well _LEFT_B_RIGHT_before_LEFT_/B_RIGHT_ submitting for permits _LEFT_LI_RIGHT_ _LEFT_B_RIGHT_07/10:_LEFT_/B_RIGHT_ Dig well, install pump, test water. _LEFT_LI_RIGHT_ _LEFT_B_RIGHT_07/29/10:_LEFT_/B_RIGHT_ Submit permit application _LEFT_LI_RIGHT_ _LEFT_B_RIGHT_09/10:_LEFT_/B_RIGHT_ Waiting for permits - patience phase _LEFT_LI_RIGHT_ _LEFT_B_RIGHT_10/10:_LEFT_/B_RIGHT_ Waiting for permits - frustration phase _LEFT_LI_RIGHT_ _LEFT_B_RIGHT_11/10:_LEFT_/B_RIGHT_ Waiting for permits - exasperation phase _LEFT_LI_RIGHT_ _LEFT_B_RIGHT_12/10:_LEFT_/B_RIGHT_ Waiting for permits - demanding phase _LEFT_LI_RIGHT_ _LEFT_B_RIGHT_01/05/11:_LEFT_/B_RIGHT_ Permits Approved!
_LEFT_/UL_RIGHT_
